item.title: FL
item.description: score:0 Chances: Nike’s plan to cut costs by $2 billion over the next three years could improve its profitability and drive stock performance in the long term. Foot Locker’s strong omni-channel capabilities and focus on leaner inventories could position the company for success in 2024.
